bibl.author: Walt Whitman
bibl.title: Walt Whitman to C. P. Somerby, [23 April 1876]
bibl.orgName: The Charles E. Feinberg Collection of the Papers of Walt Whitman, 1839–1919, Library of Congress, Washington, D.C.

revisionDesc.change: extracted transcription from Major Authors cd

body.p: Your letter of [] rec'd. I shall bear with you, trusting to the future.
Please make a bundle of all my books, Burroughs's Notes, As a Strong Bird, 67 Ed'n Edition L of G, &c, & send here to me prepaid by Express.
Make out a full plain statement of our acc't account exactly how much you owe me, how it all stands &c. & send me.
Can you supply me with a copy of Websters Quarto Dictionary, latest fullest edition, & Author's Classical Dictionary ditto?
